title: Skull
completion_text: Amazing skull! You can dress it up with some background patterns or other facial accessories. When you are done, share your creation for a chance to win it on a t-shirt!

steps.hint: First we need to set the spooky scene, make it night time - **type** `background charcoal`
We want to draw solid shapes with no stroke, so **type** `stroke 0`
We can move into position for the skull with `moveTo 250, 200`
Our skull should be white, so set the drawing color with `color white`
The skull is made with an ellipse—a kind of squashed circle. Make this with `ellipse 140, 120`
It's starting to take shape, add the final slice the same way - **type** `move -60, 90`
The mouth of the skull is a square we will draw with `square 120`
Lets move up and over for the eyes - **type** `move 10, -50`
Our skull’s empty eyes peer into your soul. Set their color to charcoal with `color charcoal`
The eye is a circle. Draw it with `circle 40`
Move on over for the other eye. **Type** `move 100`
Now draw the other eye with `circle 40`
Move on over for the nose with `move -50, 60`
Finally, for the mouth move down by **typing** `move -40, 60`
Finally, you draw the mouth with `rectangle 80, 20`
